meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well. Also means <vocabulary>shadow</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: Look at a <vocabulary>shadow</vocabulary>. It's long, surprisingly long. It's in the shape of a <reading>cage</reading> (かげ), because that's what is producing the long shadow. Check out each bar of the cage. Maybe you're inside the cage? Whatever is going on, a long shadow is being created by the cage and shade.
